fgeo.tool 0.0.0.9004
  • Reference
  • fgeo

Dataframe objects of class "krig_lst".

Source: R/to_df.R
to_df.krig_lst.Rd

This method creates a dataframe from the output of fgeo.habitat::krig() (which is a list of class "krig_lst").

# S3 method for krig_lst
to_df(.x, name = "var", item = "df", ...)

Arguments

.x

The output of fgeo.habitat::krig().
name

Name for the column to hold soil variable-names.
item

Character string; either "df" or "df.poly".
...

Arguments passed on to to_df

.x

An fgeo object of supported class.

Value

A dataframe.

See also

to_df().

Other methods for fgeo generics: to_df.demography_lst, to_df.tt_lst

Examples

# NOT RUN {
library(fgeo.habitat)
vars <- c("c", "p")
krig <- krig(soil_fake, vars, quiet = TRUE)
to_df(krig)
# }
